title: Congressman Doug Collins: Speaker Pelosi Is Not Willing To Put Her Majority In Jeopardy Over Impeachment
text:
Congressman Doug Collins (R-GA), Ranking Member of the House Judiciary Committee, spoke with Brian Kilmeade about reports that the House Judiciary Committee is considering a move to impeach President Donald Trump, his concerns that President Trump had intended to meet with the Taliban at Camp David, potential bipartisan gun legislation, Speaker Pelosi bringing up the USMCA for a vote in the House and President Trump willing to work in a bipartisan fashion to address the high cost of prescription drugs.

Watch here:
